short_summary: supporting strong and healthy teams with resilient and healthy team players
description: This is a task-based professional service requirement. The requirement is for Fisheries and Oceans Canada.
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement: Supporting Healthy Teams with Resilient Team Players

### Tender Reference Number
PW-23-01021562

### Solicitation Number
30003372

### Publication Date
16 January 2023

### Tender Closing Date
31 January 2023, 13:00:00

### Category
SRV (Services)

### Type of Tender
Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)

### Procurement Method
Competitive - Selective tendering (Concurrentielle - Appel d'offres sélectif)

### Trade Agreements
The tender is open to bidders from various countries under the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) and other trade agreements including, but not limited to, the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Region of Opportunity
Canada

### Region of Delivery
Ontario (except National Capital Region)

### Contracting Entity
Fisheries and Oceans Canada (Pêches et Océans Canada)

### Tender Description
The contracting entity is seeking professional services for TASK-Based Professional Services (TSPS) to support teams in promoting strong and healthy team dynamics. The requirement is open only to those Supply Arrangement Holders under the applicable category who have qualified under Tier 1.

### Important Document
Please find the tender document at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/16/b60597be7c2da711939143d3068eb913/30003372_-_npp_en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/16/b60597be7c2da711939143d3068eb913/30003372_-_npp_en.pdf) for English, and at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/16/d105ec8369e0160c51d36843522f8af4/30003372_-_npp_fr.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/16/d105ec8369e0160c51d36843522f8af4/30003372_-_npp_fr.pdf) for French.

### Contact Information
For further information, please contact LaKing, Cal at DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca, or by phone at 506
